attributes.headline: Don't pay AI companies—pay each other.
attributes.newWayBody: Get proven solutions. Remix for your needs. Buyers get source plus license—full access to customize, extend, and deploy however you want.
attributes.oldWayBody: Each generation from scratch. Each risking bugs. Each payment flowing to compute providers. The patterns are well-established—why regenerate them?
attributes.subheadline: The Creator Economy for Software. Everyone pays the same AI companies to generate the same things over and over. Boxel shifts value from AI compute to human creativity.
newWayBullets: Templates & Apps: Complete solutions you can customize
Skills & Prompts: Domain expertise packaged for reuse
Commands: Integrations you'd otherwise build yourself
attributes.newWayHeadline: The new way: pay creators instead.
attributes.footerBody: Start from proven apps. Pay small royalties. Keep full editability. As your work gets remixed, you earn passively.
attributes.generateCostNote: Multiple iterations • Debug hallucinations • Hope it works
attributes.remixCostNote: Production-ready • Full source • Creator gets paid
